description.p: Homunculi live through lying about their origins. You have proficiency in the Deception skill.

sheet.description: Homunculi live through lying about their origins. You have proficiency in the Deception skill.

description.p: You are a living construct. You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never make Endurance checks to resist the effect of starvation, thirst, or suffocation. All other conditions and effects affect you normally.

sheet.description: You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never make Endurance checks to resist the effect of starvation, thirst, or suffocation.

description.p: You receive different features depending on the form of vis used in your creation.
You form is imbued with the power of Animal.
Your speed increases by 10 ft.
You have natural weapons that do 1d8 slashing damage, and use your strength or dexterity, whichever is higher.
You have advantage on attacks if there is an ally within 5 ft of you.
Your vision is twice as sharp as a humans and can see twice as far.

sheet.description: You have natural weapons that do 1d8 slashing damage, and use your strength or dexterity, whichever is higher. You have advantage on attacks if there is an ally within 5 ft of you. Your vision is twice as sharp as a humans and can see twice as far.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Aquam.
You gain resistance to cold damage.
You gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
You do not suffer adverse effects in deep water.
If you start your turn fully submerged in water you gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

sheet.description: You do not suffer adverse effects in deep water, If you start your turn fully submerged in water you gain {{proficiency}} temporary hit points.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Auram.
You gain resistance to lightning damage.
You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
Melee attacks have an additional range of 5ft.

sheet.description: Melee attacks have an additional range of 5ft.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Corpus.
You can alter your appearance how you please.
You can cast alter self centered on yourself once per long rest, starting at 5th level.
You add your proficiency bonus to rolls on your hit die.

sheet.description: You can alter your appearance how you please. You can cast alter self centered on yourself once per long rest. You add your {{proficiency}} to rolls on your hit die.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Herbam.
You gain immunity to poison damage and the poisoned effect.
You have advantage on stealth checks when hiding in foliage or other plant based terrains.
When you are grappling or have been grappled by an enemy, at the start of each of their turns they take piercing damage equal to your proficiency bonus.

sheet.description: You gain immunity to poison damage and the poisoned effect. You have advantage on stealth checks when hiding in foliage or other plant based terrains. When you are grappling or have been grappled by an enemy, at the start of each of their turns they take {{proficiency}} piercing damage.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Ignem.
You gain resistance to fire damage.
Enemies that hit you with a melee attack take damage equal to half your proficiency bonus rounded up.
Your body is not affected by extreme terrain.
You treat levels of exhaustion as if they were one magnitude lower.

sheet.description: Enemies that hit you with a melee attack take {{proficiency:half:up}} fire damage. Your body is not affected by extreme terrain. You treat levels of exhaustion as if they were one magnitude lower.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Imaginem.
You gain resistance to thunder damage.
You do not produce sound when moving unless you wish to.
You have advantage on saving throws against illusions.
You are constantly under the effects of the nondetection spell.

sheet.description: You do not produce sound when moving unless you wish to. You have advantage on saving throws against illusions and charms. You are constantly under the effects of the nondetection spell.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Mentem.
You gain resistance to psychic damage.
You can make someone forget a memory for 8 hours with a range of touch provided they are not hostile. After the duration ends, the memories do not come back unless triggered by a related event.
If you target a willing creature the memory will be destroyed and cannot be recovered.
You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed and frightened.
You can speak telepathically at a range of 30ft. The target understands you and can reply if they share a language.

sheet.description: You can make someone forget a memory for 8 hours with a range of touch provided they are not hostile. After the duration ends, the memories do not come back unless triggered by a related event. If you target a willing creature the memory will be destroyed and cannot be recovered. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed and frightened. You can speak telepathically at a range of 30ft. The target understands you and can reply if they share a language.

description.p: You form is imbued with the power of Terram.
You gain resistance to slashing damage.
You gain a bonus to your hp equal to half your proficiency bonus rounded up every time you level up.
You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.
You form is imbued with the power of Vim.
You cannot attune to magic items as your body is too volatile.
You gain resistance to force damage.

You have advantage on saving throws against spells and magic effects. If you would receive this from a class feature your innate mana is amplified. You take half damage from spells and magic effects rounded up.
You gain a bonus to your armor class equal to half your proficiency bonus rounded up.

You gain a bonus to your unarmed strikes attack and damage rolls equal to half your proficiency bonus rounded up, additionally you can choose to have your unarmed strikes do force damage instead of bludgeoning.

sheet.description: You cannot attune to magic items, You have advantage on saving throws against spells and magic effects. If you would receive this from a class feature your innate mana is amplified. You take half damage from spells and magic effects rounded up.
